about_the_game:
AIMPLE Studio is a high-quality virtual broadcasting program based on Web3.
With almost everything you need for virtual broadcasting, anyone can quickly and easily become a vtuber with AIMPLE Studio.
Facial and motion tracking is possible in real time with just a interlock VMC Code base network Messages.
It offers high-quality broadcasting studios with a variety of themes and is constantly added.
Broadcasting and video content can be produced by providing various virtual camera functions.
Create your own content through AIMPLE Studio today.
detailed_description:
AIMPLE Studio is a high-quality virtual broadcasting program based on Web3.
With almost everything you need for virtual broadcasting, anyone can quickly and easily become a vtuber with AIMPLE Studio.
Facial and motion tracking is possible in real time with just a interlock VMC Code base network Messages.
It offers high-quality broadcasting studios with a variety of themes and is constantly added.
Broadcasting and video content can be produced by providing various virtual camera functions.
Create your own content through AIMPLE Studio today.
name: AIMPLE Studio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GTX 560
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A webcam is required to use facial and motion capture.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA RTX 2060
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A webcam is required to use facial and motion capture.

short_description: Broadcast program for 3D Vtuber. Unrealized and provides a high-quality broadcasting environment. With a VMC Code base network, you can easily operate your virtual avatar.
supported_languages:
English*, Japanese*, Korean*
*languages with full audio support
